mapper.delete: delete from t_uploadfile where uf_domainName=#{domainName} and uf_domainId=#{domainId}
mapper.update: update t_uploadfile set uf_domainName = #{urDomainname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uf_domainId = #{urDomainid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uf_fileName = #{urFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uf_fileDownloadUri = #{urFiledownloaduri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uf_fileType = #{urFiletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uf_size = #{urSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uf_customInfo = #{urCustominfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uf_savePath = #{urSavePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uf_originalPath = #{urOriginalPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uf_recordTime = #{urRecordtime,jdbcType=DATE} where uf_id = #{urId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
